Name: Tharn
About the game: Do you have what it takes to beat the Tharn? Players will take on the role of Dan, a loving and law abiding citizen. After some disturbances in his neighborhood, Dan went to his local community's T.H.A.R.N. Facility (Tactical Human Assisted Research Network) to file a complaint. After being in a waiting room for hours, Dan decides to try to leave, but must face the labyrinth of the T.H.A.R.N. to do so. Players must try their best to solve puzzles, crack combinations, unlock doors, smash things, and even hack a computer system all in an attempt to escape the facility.
Meta Title: Tharn: May 17, 2018, Matthew Wester and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Tharn? Check out the release date (May 17, 2018), developer insights from Matthew Wester, and a complete game summary.
